verses.verse: מִשְׁלֵ֗י <S%H4912><s%> mish-Lei, The proverbs שְׁלֹ֫מֹ֥ה <S%H8010><s%> she-Lo-Moh of Solomon פ Peh בֵּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> ben son חָ֭כָם <S%H2450><s%> Cha-chom A wise יְשַׂמַּח־ <S%H8055><s%> ye-sam-mach- maketh a glad אָ֑ב <S%H1><s%> 'Av; father וּבֵ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> u-Ven son כְּ֝סִ֗יל <S%H3684><s%> ke-Sil, but a foolish תּוּגַ֥ת <S%H8424><s%> tu-Gat [is] the heaviness אִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo. of his mother

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not י֭וֹעִילוּ <S%H3276><s%> Yo-'i-lu profit אוֹצְר֣וֹת <S%H214><s%> otz-Rot Treasures רֶ֑שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> Re-sha'; of wickedness וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה <S%H6666><s%> u-tze-da-Kah, nothing but righteousness תַּצִּ֥יל <S%H5337><s%> tatz-Tzil delivereth מִמָּֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> mi-Ma-vet. from death

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יַרְעִ֣יב <S%H7456><s%> yar-'Iv to famish יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh the soul צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik; of the righteous וְהַוַּ֖ת <S%H1942><s%> ve-hav-Vat the substance רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im of the wicked יֶהְדֹּֽף׃ <S%H1920><s%> yeh-Dof. but he casteth away

רָ֗אשׁ <S%H7326><s%> Rash, He becometh poor עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh that dealeth כַף־ <S%H3709><s%> chaf- hand רְמִיָּ֑ה <S%H7423><s%> re-mi-Yah; [with] a slack וְיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> ve-Yad but the hand חָרוּצִ֣ים <S%H2742><s%> cha-ru-Tzim of the diligent תַּעֲשִֽׁיר׃ <S%H6238><s%> ta-'a-Shir. maketh rich

אֹגֵ֣ר <S%H103><s%> 'o-Ger He that gathereth בַּ֭קַּיִץ <S%H7019><s%> Bak-ka-yitz in summer בֵּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> ben son מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <S%H7919><s%> mas-Kil; [is] a wise נִרְדָּ֥ם <S%H7290><s%> nir-Dam [but] he that sleepeth בַּ֝קָּצִ֗יר <S%H7105><s%> bak-ka-Tzir, in harvest בֵּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> ben [is] a son מֵבִֽישׁ׃ <S%H954><s%> me-Vish. that causeth shame

בְּ֭רָכוֹת <S%H1293><s%> Be-ra-chot Blessings לְרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> le-Rosh [are] upon the head צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik; of the just וּפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> u-Fi the mouth רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im, of the wicked יְכַסֶּ֥ה <S%H3680><s%> ye-chas-Seh covereth חָמָֽס׃ <S%H2555><s%> cha-Mas. but violence

זֵ֣כֶר <S%H2143><s%> Ze-cher The memory צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> Tzad-dik of the just לִבְרָכָ֑ה <S%H1293><s%> liv-ra-Chah; [is] blessed וְשֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem but the name רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im of the wicked יִרְקָֽב׃ <S%H7537><s%> yir-Kav. shall rot

חֲכַם־ <S%H2450><s%> cha-cham- The wise לֵ֭ב <S%H3820><s%> lev in heart יִקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> yik-Kach will receive מִצְוֹ֑ת <S%H4687><s%> mitz-Vot; commandments וֶאֱוִ֥יל <S%H191><s%> ve-'e-Vil fool שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם <S%H8193><s%> fa-Ta-yim, but a prating יִלָּבֵֽט׃ <S%H3832><s%> yil-la-Vet. shall fall

הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ho-Lech walketh בַּ֭תֹּם <S%H8537><s%> Bat-tom uprightly יֵ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> Ye-lech walks בֶּ֑טַח <S%H983><s%> Be-tach; surely וּמְעַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H6140><s%> u-me-'ak-Kesh but he that perverteth דְּ֝רָכָ֗יו <S%H1870><s%> de-ra-Chav, his ways יִוָּדֵֽעַ׃ <S%H3045><s%> yiv-va-De-a'. shall be known

קֹ֣רֵֽץ <S%H7169><s%> Ko-retz He that winketh עַ֭יִן <S%H5869><s%> 'A-yin with the eye יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten causeth עַצָּ֑בֶת <S%H6094><s%> 'atz-Tza-vet; sorrow וֶאֱוִ֥יל <S%H191><s%> ve-'e-Vil fool שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם <S%H8193><s%> fa-Ta-yim, but a prating יִלָּבֵֽט׃ <S%H3832><s%> yil-la-Vet. shall fall

מְק֣וֹר <S%H4726><s%> me-Kor [man is] a well חַ֭יִּים <S%H2416><s%> Chai-yim of life פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> pi The mouth צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik; of a righteous וּפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> u-Fi the mouth רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im, of the wicked יְכַסֶּ֥ה <S%H3680><s%> ye-chas-Seh covereth חָמָֽס׃ <S%H2555><s%> cha-Mas. but violence

שִׂ֭נְאָה <S%H8135><s%> ne-'ah Hatred תְּעוֹרֵ֣ר <S%H5782><s%> te-'o-Rer stirreth up מְדָנִ֑ים <S%H4090><s%> me-da-Nim; strifes וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all פְּ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H6588><s%> pe-sha-'Im, all sins תְּכַסֶּ֥ה <S%H3680><s%> te-chas-Seh covereth אַהֲבָֽה׃ <S%H160><s%> 'a-ha-Vah. but love

בְּשִׂפְתֵ֣י <S%H8193><s%> be-sif-Tei In the lips נָ֭בוֹן <S%H995><s%> Na-Von of him that hath understanding תִּמָּצֵ֣א <S%H4672><s%> tim-ma-Tze is found חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> choch-mah wisdom וְ֝שֵׁ֗בֶט <S%H7626><s%> ve-She-vet, but a rod לְגֵ֣ו <S%H1460><s%> le-Gev [is] for the back חֲסַר־ <S%H2638><s%> cha-sar- of him that is void לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> Lev. of understanding

חֲכָמִ֥ים <S%H2450><s%> cha-cha-Mim Wise יִצְפְּנוּ־ <S%H6845><s%> yitz-pe-nu- [men] lay up דָ֑עַת <S%H1847><s%> Da-'at; knowledge וּפִֽי־ <S%H6310><s%> u-fi- but the mouth אֱ֝וִיל <S%H191><s%> 'E-vil of the foolish מְחִתָּ֥ה <S%H4288><s%> me-chit-Tah destruction קְרֹבָֽה׃ <S%H7138><s%> ke-ro-Vah. [is] near

ה֣וֹן <S%H1952><s%> Hon wealth עָ֭שִׁיר <S%H6223><s%> 'A-shir The rich man's קִרְיַ֣ת <S%H7151><s%> kir-Yat city עֻזּ֑וֹ <S%H5797><s%> uz-Zo; [is] his strong מְחִתַּ֖ת <S%H4288><s%> me-chit-Tat the destruction דַּלִּ֣ים <S%H1800><s%> dal-Lim of the poor רֵישָֽׁם׃ <S%H7389><s%> rei-Sham. [is] their poverty

פְּעֻלַּ֣ת <S%H6468><s%> pe-'ul-Lat The labour צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik of the righteous לְחַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> le-chai-Yim; [tendeth] to life תְּבוּאַ֖ת <S%H8393><s%> te-vu-'At the fruit רָשָׁ֣ע <S%H7563><s%> ra-Sha' of the wicked לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <S%H2403><s%> le-chat-Tat. to sin

אֹ֣רַח <S%H734><s%> 'O-rach He [is in] the way לְ֭חַיִּים <S%H2416><s%> Le-chai-yim of life שׁוֹמֵ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> sho-Mer that keepeth מוּסָ֑ר <S%H4148><s%> mu-Sar; instruction וְעוֹזֵ֖ב <S%H5800><s%> ve-'o-Zev but he that refuseth תּוֹכַ֣חַת <S%H8433><s%> to-Cha-chat reproof מַתְעֶֽה׃ <S%H8582><s%> mat-'Eh. erreth

מְכַסֶּ֣ה <S%H3680><s%> me-chas-Seh He that hideth שִׂ֭נְאָה <S%H8135><s%> ne-'ah hatred שִׂפְתֵי־ <S%H8193><s%> sif-tei- lips שָׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> Sha-ker; [with] lying וּמוֹצִ֥א <S%H3318><s%> u-mo-Tzi and he that uttereth דִ֝בָּ֗ה <S%H1681><s%> dib-Bah, a slander ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he כְסִֽיל׃ <S%H3684><s%> che-Sil. [is] a fool

בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> be-Ro In the multitude דְּ֭בָרִים <S%H1697><s%> De-va-rim of words לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יֶחְדַּל־ <S%H2308><s%> yech-dal- there wanteth פָּ֑שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> Pa-sha'; not sin וְחֹשֵׂ֖ךְ <S%H2820><s%> ve-cho-Sech but he that refraineth שְׂפָתָ֣יו <S%H8193><s%> se-fa-Tav his lips מַשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <S%H7919><s%> mas-Kil. [is] wise

כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef silver נִ֭בְחָר <S%H977><s%> Niv-chor [is as] choice לְשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> le-Shon The tongue צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik; of the just לֵ֖ב <S%H3820><s%> lev the heart רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im of the wicked כִּמְעָֽט׃ <S%H4592><s%> kim-'At. [is] little worth

שִׂפְתֵ֣י <S%H8193><s%> sif-Tei The lips צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> Tzad-dik of the righteous יִרְע֣וּ <S%H7462><s%> yir-'U feed רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim; many וֶֽ֝אֱוִילִ֗ים <S%H191><s%> ve-'e-vi-Lim, but fools בַּחֲסַר־ <S%H2638><s%> ba-cha-sar- for want לֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> lev of wisdom יָמֽוּתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mu-tu. die

בִּרְכַּ֣ת <S%H1293><s%> bir-Kat The blessing יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> hi that תַעֲשִׁ֑יר <S%H6238><s%> ta-'a-Shir; it maketh rich וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no יוֹסִ֖ף <S%H3254><s%> yo-Sif and he addeth עֶ֣צֶב <S%H6089><s%> 'E-tzev no sorrow עִמָּֽהּ׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mah. is like

כִּשְׂח֣וֹק <S%H7814><s%> kis-Chok [It is] as sport לִ֭כְסִיל <S%H3684><s%> Lich-sil to a fool עֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> a-Sot to do זִמָּ֑ה <S%H2154><s%> zim-Mah; mischief וְ֝חָכְמָ֗ה <S%H2451><s%> ve-cha-che-Mah, hath wisdom לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish but a man תְּבוּנָֽה׃ <S%H8394><s%> te-vu-Nah. of understanding

מְגוֹרַ֣ת <S%H4034><s%> me-go-Rat The fear רָ֭שָׁע <S%H7563><s%> Ra-sho' of the wicked הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he תְבוֹאֶ֑נּוּ <S%H935><s%> te-vo-'En-nu; it shall come וְתַאֲוַ֖ת <S%H8378><s%> ve-ta-'a-Vat upon him but the desire צַדִּיקִ֣ים <S%H6662><s%> tzad-di-Kim of the righteous יִתֵּֽן׃ <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten. shall be granted

כַּעֲב֣וֹר <S%H5674><s%> ka-'a-Vor passeth ס֭וּפָה <S%H5492><s%> Su-fah As the whirlwind וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein is no רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> ra-Sha'; so [is] the wicked וְ֝צַדִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> ve-tzad-Dik, no [more] but the righteous יְס֣וֹד <S%H3247><s%> ye-Sod foundation עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. [is] an everlasting

כַּחֹ֤מֶץ׀ <S%H2558><s%> ka-Cho-metz As vinegar לַשִּׁנַּ֗יִם <S%H8127><s%> lash-shin-Na-yim, to the teeth וְכֶעָשָׁ֥ן <S%H6227><s%> ve-che-'a-Shan and as smoke לָעֵינָ֑יִם <S%H5869><s%> la-'ei-Na-yim; to the eyes כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken So הֶ֝עָצֵ֗ל <S%H6102><s%> he-'a-Tzel, so [is] the sluggard לְשֹׁלְחָֽיו׃ <S%H7971><s%> le-sho-le-Chav. to them that send

יִרְאַ֣ת <S%H3374><s%> yir-'At The fear יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD תּוֹסִ֣יף <S%H3254><s%> to-Sif prolongeth יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim; days וּשְׁנ֖וֹת <S%H8141><s%> u-she-Not but the years רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im of the wicked תִּקְצֹֽרְנָה׃ <S%H7114><s%> tik-Tzo-re-nah. shall be shortened

תּוֹחֶ֣לֶת <S%H8431><s%> to-Che-let The hope צַדִּיקִ֣ים <S%H6662><s%> tzad-di-Kim of the righteous שִׂמְחָ֑ה <S%H8057><s%> sim-Chah; [shall be] gladness וְתִקְוַ֖ת <S%H8615><s%> ve-tik-Vat but the expectation רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im of the wicked תֹּאבֵֽד׃ <S%H6><s%> to-Ved. shall perish

מָע֣וֹז <S%H4581><s%> ma-'oz [is] strength לַ֭תֹּם <S%H8537><s%> Lat-tom to the upright דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech The way יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וּ֝מְחִתָּ֗ה <S%H4288><s%> u-me-chit-Tah, but destruction לְפֹ֣עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> le-Fo-'a-lei [shall be] to the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven. of iniquity

צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik The righteous לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam shall never בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- lest יִמּ֑וֹט <S%H4131><s%> yim-Mot; be removed וּ֝רְשָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> u-re-sha-'Im, but the wicked לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo will not יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <S%H7931><s%> yish-ke-nu- shall not inhabit אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. the earth

פִּֽי־ <S%H6310><s%> pi- The mouth צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> Tzad-dik of the just יָנ֣וּב <S%H5107><s%> ya-Nuv bringeth forth חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> choch-mah wisdom וּלְשׁ֥וֹן <S%H3956><s%> u-le-Shon tongue תַּ֝הְפֻּכ֗וֹת <S%H8419><s%> tah-pu-Chot, but the froward תִּכָּרֵֽת׃ <S%H3772><s%> tik-ka-Ret. shall be cut out

שִׂפְתֵ֣י <S%H8193><s%> sif-Tei The lips צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> Tzad-dik of the righteous יֵדְע֣וּן <S%H3045><s%> ye-de-'Un know רָצ֑וֹן <S%H7522><s%> ra-Tzon; what is acceptable וּפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> u-Fi but the mouth רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im, of the wicked תַּהְפֻּכֽוֹת׃ <S%H8419><s%> tah-pu-Chot. [speaketh] frowardness
